channel.title: Project Natal
channel.description:
I don't know if this is the official name. But it looks bloody awesome.
[url]https://e3.gamespot.com/video/6210712/[/url] Discuss.. :retard:
Other Info: [url]https://www.developmag.com/news/32108/Rare-intimately-involved-with-Project-Natal[/url]

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
Unknowncode:

People don’t come home to relax by waving their arms around like a lunatic. It has about as much novelty as a bobble head figure.

https://www.escapistmagazine.com/videos/view/zero-punctuation/779-The-Second-Annual-E3-Hype-Massacre

People will still buy it. The Wii is the same concept, yet it sells more than anything else.

I’m looking forward to Natal, it sounds fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Unknowncode:

Yahtzee’s review about E3 which includes a section on Project Natal is all you need to know. Basically, it’s a gimic. People don’t come home to relax by waving their arms around like a lunatic. It has about as much novelty as a bobble head figure.

https://www.escapistmagazine.com/videos/view/zero-punctuation/779-The-Second-Annual-E3-Hype-Massacre

Wasn’t it clear from the very beginning? :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Lastly: if you understand that it’s an opinion then it shouldn’t bother you.

No, it wouldn’t. Shoulda ignore you altogether from the very beginning.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: Crunchy
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Yeah, and juggling between keyboard and joystick is fucking awesome.

This = opinion

Ahh, your opinion is no more important than anyone else’s. My point in replying to imonfire was that he was implying that it somehow takes more hands to use a separate keyboard, but you obviously can’t type and use both joysticks at the same time anyway. Seems to me like it would be just as easy to have a separate keyboard and a controller that was manageable. The thing about fat bastards was simply because if you can’t be troubled to use more than one device at a time (even when it makes more sense which I’ll admit is simply my opinion), means you might be incapable of simple work/effort like the kind required to do some exercise.

Lastly: if you understand that it’s an opinion then it shouldn’t bother you.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Unless, you’re a lazy fat bastard. How about a controller that works well as a controller and a keyboard that is…you know…just a keyboard. It’s not that difficult.

What does it have to do with obesity? How about you stop throwing your useless opinions around and let people like me and Imonfire discuss cool stuff?

It might save the ‘drop on lap’ and the ‘move hands to keyboard’ operations, but the 95% of the time when you just need to hold the controller, you’re holding on a 5lbs huge thing that seems far from ergonomic.

It’s designed to be on your lap all the time, bub.

Read full topic

Because unfortunately I lack of a third hand to type on my keyboard while I have both hands on my controller.

I’ve had a few, they’re perfectly fine, pretty durable. Also, they make possibly the best 2 racing wheels in their price range too. They know what they’re doing, you don’t

item.description:

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Level:

That controller with the keyboard, is probably the most retarded thing I’ve ever seen, the keyboard probably makes it too heavy to use over periods of time and, well, it’s a fucking keyboard in a controller.

Well, you are completely wrong. Actually read some reviews before jumping to the conclusions.
The purpose was to play some mmorpgs on ps2, not DMC3 on PC. And it was succesful seing how half of FFXI players bought it. And not only FFXI players.
It would not be created if it was retarded in the first place. And it of course wouldn’t be labeled “must have”, which it was in many reviews back in that day.

Next time, don’t write bullshit about thing you know nothing about.
Actually those two little keypads on top of the page are much more uncomfortable to use.

Crunchy:

Yeah, if you’re that desperate for a keyboard, why not just set a keyboard next to you while you play?

errrm…

Imonfire:

If someone managed to build an hybrid of an analog stick and a keyboard, I’d make him love. Furiously.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Logitech controllers are crap. The best gamepad for the PC would have to be the xbox 360’s controller. It has native drivers on Vista/7, and most games that are multiplatform and come under the Games for Windows branding have default settings for it, which seamlessly change over from keyboard controls when your plug the controller in. I played all of Prototype with an X360 controller.

You have no idea what the actual talk was about.
And no, logitech controllers are NOT crap.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: NavMan
item.description:
Logitech controllers are crap. The best gamepad for the PC would have to be the xbox 360’s controller. It has native drivers on Vista/7, and most games that are multiplatform and come under the Games for Windows branding have default settings for it, which seamlessly change over from keyboard controls when your plug the controller in. I played all of Prototype with an X360 controller.

item.title: Project Natal
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Yo guise, look what I found:



Old stuff from logitech made for Final Fantasy online, called Logitech NetPlay Controller for PS2, seen it in a gaming magazine eons ago. IIRC works with PC as well :jizz:
EDIT:
https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-NetPlay-Controller-Sony-Playstation/dp/B00006SKJ4
$69.95? Bargain.
EDIT: Well, actually, not really:
https://www.amazon.co.uk/Logitech-Netplay-Controller-All-One/dp/B0006LCMCW
https://www.gameseek.co.uk/pd/PS2agg47ebxuaamp9a4/
P.S. The fact that it was announced 7 years ago and still in stock is fucking awesome.

Read full topic
